channel.title: Swords & Staffs - Mafia HQ
channel.description:
### Welcome on board! ### Today, the Godfather intrust you with a mission of great importance. Please pick one of the passives. Choose wisely, you have 12 hours!
> # [color=red]Adaptive Mafia Goon[/color] > At start of the game, you can choose one of the following passives: > - You appear as Citizen for investigators. > - Your visits are hidden. > - You're roleblock immune. > >_Defeat the Town._
### Passives: >BlueStorm: You're roleblock immune. Geyde: You appear as Citizen for investigators.

item.title: Swords & Staffs - Mafia HQ
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Geyde:
[VFM] Swords & Staffs - Mafia Wins!

@DatBird My particular ISOs… on everyone.

Geyde: Other than the association with Bazi, I don’t see him as scum. Yet.

Bazinga: You’re asking me to read this guy, who happens to be at 29 post… wait he has good stuff.

[VFM] Swords & Staffs - Mafia Wins!

Even if you were mafia I would say you are town to not let certain people dominate discussion in case they were scum. I don’t think you’re mafia though

This post. What does it mean? I don’t. I can’t get it. However, hes a wildcard. I can live with that… because there are more red leans on my list.

Next… DatBird. I don’t find anything here. However, I can and will suspect you of being wolf… simply because that the last thing you did was lets go bigbrain lets go onto Alice.

The next few people are horrible. Absolutely horrible. They have less posts than the darned host. (Wazza.) Read them? They’re slankers.

Wazza can be figured out.
@WazzaAzza Do Something other than your Discordians.

Magnus. Oh Magnus. I’ve been pushing on him. It should be easy to find in my 50+ posts… of which

Looks at Blue post.
Wait nani

I find Shuri’s readlist to be the most scummy at this point.
If we go from the perspective I’ve already established

Geyde:

This is the exact situation scum want to play out for in LyLo, despite the above three players actually contributing to the gamestate.

Shuri’s readslist perfectly follows the ‘more active scum’ at this point in the game.

DON’T VOTE until we are absolutely certain that we won’t fuck up.

Read full topic

item.title: Swords & Staffs - Mafia HQ
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Blue not insta-vigging Magnus despite it being the safest shot possible. I think it’s fairly townie as his deepwolf paranoia is something he only really shows as town. Pushing against Alice their read as more hysteria and less actually rooted in logic.
Their activity has much to be desired, but scum would have reason to be significantly more active d2 as all ‘active threats’ are gone. I’ve been disinterested in this game which has shown itself in more ways than one.

people who tried harder d2:

Shuri
Dat
Waz

I’d say there has to be one scum in this list just based off of how the game has played out. We have a lot of potential scum, but we don’t have any solid townreads. This is the exact situation scum want to play out for in LyLo, despite the above three players actually contributing to the gamestate.

Read full topic

item.title: Swords & Staffs - Mafia HQ
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
I say Shuri as their activity ramped up heavily after all the active solvers died.
They focused the entirety of their d1 on Magnus, hedging onto me while parroting what Math was saying for no good reason. They weren’t bringing up anything new and weren’t directly agreeing with Math.
It’s posturing, setting up their progression for after Magnus flipped.

Read full topic

item.title: Swords & Staffs - Mafia HQ
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
First, everyone says who they suspect most.
Then person who is most suspected by general thread votes a person who they suspect most.
Making it effective 1 vs 1 and after some more 1 vs 1 discussion, remaining people decide.

Why this instead of random votes?

If most suspected is mafia, they will chose a townie and will make it 1 vs 1 with TOWN deciding.
If most suspected is town, they can still chose mafia for 1 vs 1 and have TOWN deciding.

If town is most suspected and they chose town… it means town was just scumreading each other and it would be lost anyway if they voted randomly.

That’s a methode for LyLos wich lowers the risk of random votes and quickhammers.

Read full topic
